Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by New York in 2019...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2019, off Jamaal Bray (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/22/2019, off Rafael Gonzalez (PIT)...

Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...

Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
